title: Review: POC’s Oseus VPD knee pads plus 2021 jerseys, shorts, and gloves
content:
I was never a dedicated follower of fashion, but beyond looks there’s one advantage to assembling a whole kit from one brand: everything should work well together. This spring POC set me up with a bunch of clothing and gear to test, and I’ve found all the pieces performed well on the trail, and they

The post Review: POC’s Oseus VPD knee pads plus 2021 jerseys, shorts, and gloves appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Steve Fisher
